Package xwang10_hw2.vault

Interface Vault

public interface Vault

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    addNewSite(String username, String password, String sitename)
    Adds a new site to the vault for the user, generates, stores, and returns a password for that site.

  • Method Details

    • addNewUser

      void addNewUser(String username, String password) throws xwang10_hw2.exceptions.InvalidUsernameException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.InvalidPasswordException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.DuplicateUserException
      Add a new user to the vault (with no site passwords). For example, a username and password is supplied, and the system does no verification or checking except that the username and password must be in correct formats, and the username cannot already be in the vault.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be added
      password - The password to be associated with this user
      Throws:
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.InvalidUsernameException - The supplied username is invalid
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.InvalidPasswordException - The supplied password is invalid
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.DuplicateUserException - The username is already in the vault

    • addNewSite

      String addNewSite(String username, String password, String sitename) throws xwang10_hw2.exceptions.DuplicateSiteException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserNotFoundException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserLockedOutException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.PasswordMismatchException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.InvalidSiteException
      Adds a new site to the vault for the user, generates, stores, and returns a password for that site. For example, if a user is creating an account at the site "amazon" for the first time, he/she calls the vault with the site name, and the site makes up a password for the user/site, returns the (plain text password to the user, and stores the (encrypted) password -- all stored passwords in the vault.
      Parameters:
      username - The username requesting the new site password
      password - Password for the username
      sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
      Returns:
      A new (plaintext) password for the requested site
      Throws:
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.DuplicateSiteException - There is already a site stored for this user
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.InvalidSiteException - The site name supplied is invalid

    • updateSitePassword

      String updateSitePassword(String username, String password, String sitename) throws xwang10_hw2.exceptions.SiteNotFoundException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserNotFoundException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserLockedOutException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.PasswordMismatchException
      Generate, store, and return an updated password for a site associated with the user. For example, the user wants to change his/her password on "amazon," and the system generates a new password, stores an encrypted version for the user, and returns the plaintext version.
      Parameters:
      username - The username requesting the new site password
      password - Password for the username
      sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
      Returns:
      An updated (plaintext) password for the requested site
      Throws:
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.SiteNotFoundException - The user has no password associated with this site
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password

    • retrieveSitePassword

      String retrieveSitePassword(String username, String password, String sitename) throws xwang10_hw2.exceptions.SiteNotFoundException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserNotFoundException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserLockedOutException, xwang10_hw2.exceptions.PasswordMismatchException
      Retrieve the (plaintext) password for the user for the requested site. For example, the user supplies the name of a site, and if she has a stored password for the site, it is returned in plain text.
      Parameters:
      username - The username requesting the site password
      password - Password for the username
      sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
      Returns:
      The (plaintext) password for the requested site
      Throws:
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.SiteNotFoundException - The user has no password associated with this site
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
      xwang10_hw2.exceptions.PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password
